mapper.insert: insert into homework(h_name,com_id, course_id, h_url, publish_date, end_date,h_path,mark) values (#{hName},#{comId},#{courseId},#{hUrl},#{publishDate},#{endDate},#{hPath},#{mark});
mapper.select: select j.h_id,j.h_name,j.course_id, j.h_url,j.publish_date, j.end_date,j.mark,c.course_id,c.cs_name from homework j inner join course c on j.course_id = c.course_id and j.com_id = #{comId}
select count(*) from homework where com_id = #{cmtId};

select j.h_id,j.h_name,j.course_id, j.h_url,j.publish_date, j.end_date,j.mark,c.course_id,c.cs_name from homework j inner join course c on j.course_id = c.course_id and j.h_name like concat('%',#{hName},'%') and j.com_id = #{comId};
